Package de.dlr.proseo.storagemgr.cache

Klasse FileInfo

java.lang.Object
de.dlr.proseo.storagemgr.cache.FileInfo
public class FileInfo extends Object
File Info (last Accessed and file size) for File Cache with sorting and search
Autor:
Denys Chaykovskiy
